text: Askar Akayevich Akayev (; born 10 November 1944) is a retired Kyrgyz politician. He was the 1st President of Kyrgyzstan from 27 October 1990 until 24 March 2005. In 2005, people disagreed about the result of the election. Some people said the election was unfair. There were protests and Akayev escaped to Russia. He became a professor at Moscow State University. ==Related pages== *List of scientists from Asia == Other websites == * Lenta.ru Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Kyrgyzstan
title: Askar Akayev
